name: GPT-Respond-Box
description: GPT-Respond-Box is an automated AI mailbox for businesses that can read, understand, and respond to emails. It is designed to help automate customer support, sales, and marketing tasks, as well as perform pre-setup tasks on behalf of the user.

stories.story: As a business owner, I want to ensure my customers receive timely responses to their support inquiries, even when human agents are not available.
stories.goal: Automate responses to common customer support inquiries

stories.story: As a marketing manager, I want to send out automated marketing emails to segments of my customer base based on their preferences and behaviors.
stories.goal: Effectively target and automate marketing communications

stories.story: As a store manager, I want to use AI to sort customer emails regarding orders and automatically update order details in the system.
stories.goal: Streamline order management through email automation

stories.story: As a user, I want to set up automatic email responses for certain tasks I manually predefine, such as sending invoices or booking confirmations.
stories.goal: Automate pre-setup tasks based on email interactions
